001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.UnexpectedOpCodeException;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.UnexpectedTransactionIdException;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.JavaHelpers;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
010
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
012
013import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
014
015import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
016import java.util.Arrays;
017import java.util.Set;
018
019
020public class PacketArrayList {
021    protected static final String TAG = "PacketArrayList";
022    public static final String IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC = "IGNORE_HMAC_SIGNATURE_EXCEPTION";
023    public static boolean ignoreInvalidTxId = false;
024
025    protected byte expectedOpCode;
026    protected byte expectedCargoSize;
027    protected int actualExpectedCargoSize;
028    protected byte expectedTxId;
029    protected boolean isSigned;
030    protected byte[] fullCargo;
031    protected byte[] messageData;
032
033    protected byte firstByteMod15;
034    protected byte opCode;
035    protected boolean empty = true;
036    protected final byte[] expectedCrc = {0, 0};
037
038    protected PacketArrayList(byte expectedopCode, byte expectedCargoSize, byte expectedTxId, boolean isSigned) {
039        Validate.isTrue(expectedopCode != 0);
040        Validate.isTrue(expectedCargoSize >= 0 || (256 + (int)expectedCargoSize) >= 0);
041        this.expectedCargoSize = expectedCargoSize;
042        if (expectedCargoSize < 0 && expectedCargoSize > -128) {
043            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 256 + expectedCargoSize;
044        } else {
045            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = expectedCargoSize;
046        }
047        this.expectedOpCode = expectedopCode;
048        this.expectedTxId = expectedTxId;
049        this.isSigned = isSigned;
050        this.fullCargo = new byte[(this.actualExpectedCargoSize + 2)];
051        this.messageData = new byte[3];
052    }
053
054    // Returns either PacketArrayList or StreamPacketArrayList depending on the opcode
055    public static PacketArrayList build(byte expectedopCode, Characteristic characteristic, byte expectedCargoSize, byte expectedTxId, boolean isSigned) {
056        Class<? extends Message> messageClass = Messages.fromOpcode(expectedopCode, characteristic);
057        L.d(TAG, String.format("queried messageClass for expectedOpcode %d, %s: expectedCargoSize=%d", expectedopCode, messageClass, expectedCargoSize));
058        MessageProps messageProps = messageClass.getAnnotation(MessageProps.class);
059        if (messageProps.stream()) {
060            return new StreamPacketArrayList(expectedopCode, expectedCargoSize, expectedTxId, isSigned);
061        }
062
063        return new PacketArrayList(expectedopCode, expectedCargoSize, expectedTxId, isSigned);
064    }
065
066    public byte[] messageData() {
067        return messageData;
068    }
069
070    public byte opCode() {
071        return opCode;
072    }
073
074    public final boolean needsMorePacket() {
075        byte b = this.firstByteMod15;
076        return b >= 0;
077    }
078
079    private void createExpectedCrc() {
080        if (this.fullCargo.length >= 2) {
081            System.arraycopy(this.fullCargo, this.fullCargo.length - 2, this.expectedCrc, 0, 2);
082        }
083    }
084
085    public boolean validate(byte[] authKey) {
086        Validate.notNull(authKey, "ak");
087        if (needsMorePacket()) {
088            return false;
089        }
090        createMessageData();
091        createExpectedCrc();
092        byte[] a = Bytes.calculateCRC16(this.messageData);
093        byte[] lastTwoB = this.expectedCrc;
094        boolean ok = true;
095
096        if (!(a[0] == lastTwoB[0] && a[1] == lastTwoB[1])) {
097            ok = false;
098        }
099        // the fullCargo size is 2 + the message length.
100        L.d(TAG, "validate fullCargo size="+fullCargo.length+" ok="+ok);
101        if (!ok) {
102            if (shouldIgnoreInvalidHmac(authKey)) {
103                L.e(TAG, "CRC validation failed for: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode) + ". a: " + Hex.encodeHexString(a) + " lastTwoB: " + Hex.encodeHexString(lastTwoB) + ". fullCargo len=" + fullCargo.length + " opCode="+opCode);
104            } else {
105                throw new InvalidCRCException("CRC validation failed for: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode) + ". a: " + Hex.encodeHexString(a) + " lastTwoB: " + Hex.encodeHexString(lastTwoB) + ". fullCargo len=" + fullCargo.length + " opCode="+opCode+" authKey="+new String(authKey));
106            }
107        } else if (this.isSigned) {
108            L.d(TAG, "validate(" + Hex.encodeHexString(authKey) + ") messageData: " + Hex.encodeHexString(messageData) + " len: " + messageData.length + " fullCargo: " + Hex.encodeHexString(fullCargo) + " len: " + fullCargo.length);
109            byte[] byteArray = Bytes.dropLastN(this.messageData, 20);
110            byte[] bArr2 = this.messageData;
111            byte[] expectedHmac = Bytes.dropFirstN(bArr2, bArr2.length - 20);
112            byte[] hmacSha = Packetize.doHmacSha1(byteArray, authKey);
113            if (!Arrays.equals(expectedHmac, hmacSha)) {
114                L.e(TAG, "Pump response invalid signature: expectedHmac=" + Hex.encodeHexString(expectedHmac)+" hmacSha="+Hex.encodeHexString(hmacSha));
115                if (shouldIgnoreInvalidHmac(authKey)) {
116                    return true;
117                }
118
119
120                throw new InvalidSignedMessageHMACSignatureException("Pump response invalid: SIGNATURE");
121            }
122        }
123        return ok;
124    }
125
126    protected void createMessageData() {
127        byte[] bArr = this.messageData;
128        bArr[0] = this.expectedOpCode;
129        bArr[1] = this.expectedTxId;
130        bArr[2] = this.expectedCargoSize;
131        this.messageData = Bytes.combine(bArr, Bytes.dropLastN(this.fullCargo, 2));
132    }
133
134    protected void parse(byte[] bArr) {
135        byte opCode = bArr[2];
136        int cargoSize = bArr[4];
137        if (cargoSize < 0 && cargoSize > -128) {
138            cargoSize += 256;
139        }
140        // ErrorResponse handling. Can have a dynamic cargo size in different situations.
141        if (77 == opCode && 2 == cargoSize) {
142            this.expectedOpCode = 77;
143            this.expectedCargoSize = 2;
144            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 2;
145            this.fullCargo = new byte[4];
146        } else if (77 == opCode && 26 == cargoSize) {
147            this.expectedOpCode = 77;
148            this.expectedCargoSize = 26;
149            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 26;
150            this.fullCargo = new byte[28];
151        }
152        // ApiVersionRequest can either have 0 cargo size or 2
153        // its cargo size is set as 2 in the MessageProps but we allow the 0-cargo here as well
154        if (32 == opCode && 0 == cargoSize) {
155            this.expectedCargoSize = 0;
156            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 0;
157        }
158        // CommonSoftwareInfoRequest can have cargo size 0 or 1
159        else if (-114 == opCode && 1 == cargoSize) {
160            this.expectedCargoSize = 1;
161            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 1;
162        }
163        // CommonSoftwareInfoResponse can have cargo size 60 or 51
164        else if (-113 == opCode && 51 == cargoSize) {
165            this.expectedCargoSize = 51;
166            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 51;
167        }
168
169
170
171        if (opCode == this.expectedOpCode) {
172            this.firstByteMod15 = (byte) (bArr[0] & 15);
173            this.opCode = bArr[2];
174            byte txId = bArr[3];
175            L.d(TAG, "PacketArrayList firstByteMod15="+firstByteMod15+" opCode="+opCode+" txId="+txId+" expectedTxId="+expectedTxId+" bArr="+JavaHelpers.display(bArr));
176            if (txId != this.expectedTxId) {
177                throwUnexpectedTransactionIdException(txId);
178            } else if (cargoSize != this.actualExpectedCargoSize) {
179                if (cargoSize == this.actualExpectedCargoSize + 24 && isSigned) {
180                    L.d(TAG, "adding +24 expectedCargoSize for already signed request which contains an existing trailer");
181                    expectedCargoSize += 24;
182                    actualExpectedCargoSize += 24;
183                } else {
184                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected cargo size: " + ((int) cargoSize) + ", expecting " + ((int) this.actualExpectedCargoSize) + " for opCode="+opCode);
185                }
186            }
187            this.fullCargo = Bytes.dropFirstN(bArr, 5);
188        } else {
189            throw new UnexpectedOpCodeException(opCode, this.expectedOpCode);
190        }
191        L.d(TAG, "PacketArrayParse ok: opCode="+opCode+" firstByteMod15="+firstByteMod15+" cargoSize="+cargoSize);
192    }
193
194
195    public void validatePacket(byte[] packetData) {
196        Validate.notNull(packetData, "packetData");
197        if (packetData.length == 0) {
198            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Empty data");
199        } else if (packetData.length >= 3) {
200            byte firstByteMod15 = (byte) (packetData[0] & 15);
201            byte secondByte = packetData[1];
202            L.d(TAG, "Found tx id: "+secondByte+" expected "+this.expectedTxId);
203            if (secondByte == this.expectedTxId) {
204                if (this.empty) {
205                    this.firstByteMod15 = firstByteMod15;
206                    L.d(TAG, "txid matches, firstByteMod15="+firstByteMod15+", parsing packetData");
207                    parse(packetData);
208                } else if (((byte) 0) == firstByteMod15) {
209                    L.d(TAG, "firstByteMod15=0");
210                    if (this.firstByteMod15 == firstByteMod15) {
211                        this.fullCargo = Bytes.combine(this.fullCargo, Bytes.dropFirstN(packetData, 2));
212                        L.d(TAG, "firstByteMod15 matches expected, fullCargo="+ Hex.encodeHexString(fullCargo));
213                    } else {
214                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected packets remaining 3: " + ((int) firstByteMod15) + ", expected " + ((int) this.firstByteMod15) + ", opCode: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode));
215                    }
216                } else if (this.firstByteMod15 == firstByteMod15) {
217                    this.fullCargo = Bytes.combine(this.fullCargo, Bytes.dropFirstN(packetData, 2));
218                    L.d(TAG, "firstByteMod15 matches expected, nonzero, fullCargo=" + Hex.encodeHexString(fullCargo));
219                } else {
220                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected packets remaining 2: " + ((int) firstByteMod15) + ", expected " + ((int) this.firstByteMod15) + ", opCode: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode));
221                }
222                this.empty = false;
223                this.firstByteMod15 = (byte) (this.firstByteMod15 - 1);
224                L.d(TAG, "validatePacket: decrementing firstByteMod15 to " + firstByteMod15);
225                return;
226            }
227            throwUnexpectedTransactionIdException(secondByte);
228        } else {
229            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid data size: " + packetData.length);
230        }
231    }
232
233    private void throwUnexpectedTransactionIdException(byte foundTxId) {
234        RuntimeException ex = new UnexpectedTransactionIdException(foundTxId, this.expectedTxId, this.expectedOpCode);
235        if (ignoreInvalidTxId) {
236            L.e(TAG, ex);
237            return;
238        }
239        throw ex;
240    }
241
242    private boolean shouldIgnoreInvalidHmac(byte[] authKey) {
243        return Arrays.equals(
244                Arrays.copyOfRange(authKey, 0, IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC.length()),
245                Arrays.copyOfRange(IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8), 0, IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC.length())
246        );
247    }
248
249    public String toString() {
250        return JavaHelpers.autoToString(this, Set.of());
251    }
252
253    public static class InvalidCRCException extends RuntimeException {
254        InvalidCRCException(String message) {
255            super(message);
256        }
257    }
258
259    public static class InvalidSignedMessageHMACSignatureException extends RuntimeException {
260        InvalidSignedMessageHMACSignatureException(String message) {
261            super(message);
262        }
263    }
264}
